label: applicableSpecifiedInspection
comment: A specified inspection applicable to this logistics transport movement.
A specified inspection applicable to this product batch.
A specified inspection applicable to this production facility.
A specified inspection applicable to this production process.
A specified inspection applicable to this referenced location.
A specified inspection applicable to this trade party.
An inspection applicable to this trade product.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of performing documented checks, such as on materials or processes, with a focus on discovering deviations, errors or faults related to documented requirements.

domainIncludes.comment: A reference to a physical location or place.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A man made physical structure, such as a building, in which something is produced.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
